welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Prestwich, a charming town known for its quaint streets and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and discover all the hidden gems this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves mostly low-cost and leisure flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves long-haul and some European flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The smaller terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warton Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Warton Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
